---
title: "NotteClient"
description: "The starting point for all operations"
---
import Client from '/snippets/client/index.mdx';

With the notte sdk, everything starts by creating your NotteClient:

<Client/>

From there, you're able to create browser sessions, run new agents, or manage credential vaults:

## Available Operations

<CardGroup cols={3}>
  <Card
    title="Sessions"
    icon="browser"

  >
    List and manage browser sessions
  </Card>
  <Card
    title="Agents"

  >
    List and manage automation agents
  </Card>
  <Card
    title="Vaults"

  >
    Create and manage secure credential vaults
  </Card>
</CardGroup>
